tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE device_health_metrics (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  cpu_usage FLOAT,
  memory_usage FLOAT,
  storage_usage FLOAT,
  network_traffic FLOAT,
  security_monitoring BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE device_health_metrics ( 
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    temperature FLOAT, 
    humidity FLOAT, 
    status VARCHAR(10) 
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data ( 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP PRIMARY KEY, 
    device_id INT, 
    cpu_usage FLOAT, 
    memory_usage FLOAT, 
    disk_space FLOAT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_health_metrics(device_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE device_health_metrics (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    disk_usage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    network_speed FLOAT,
    cpu_temp FLOAT,
    memory_size FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE security_data (
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    security_alert BOOLEAN,
    security_score FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceMetrics (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    pressure FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
    device_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    storage_usage FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityMonitoring (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR,
    event_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_data (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cpu_usage FLOAT,
    memory_usage FLOAT,
    disk_usage FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_description TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP
);
